title: Is nuclear power worth the risks?
itunes:title: Is nuclear power worth the risks?
description:
Daniel and Kelly talk about whether we need nuclear power to reduce carbon emissions, and whether it can be done safely. 

https://www.smbc-comics.com/soonish/lostchapter/index.html
